Subjects: vanity, against worldly; transitoriness, of world
_description: William Herebert, The vanity of the world — questions and answers in eight alternately rhyming lines

BLAdd46919.First Lines: What lyf ys þer herþe lyf her ys deyȝe…
BLAdd46919.Last Lines: …What skyl ys þer herþat shal prute wreyȝe
BLAdd46919.Note: Written as prose; introduced in text with “Anglice sic.”
BLAdd46919.Editions:
Gneuss,  Helmut. 
             “William Herberts übersetzungen.” 
             Anglia
         78 (1960): 169-92: 192.
Reimer,  Stephen R. 
             The Works of William Herebert, OFM.
         Toronto: Pontifical Institute of Mediaeval Studies, 1987: 137.
